20110112140321.000|20110112140327.000|CC1|CAR PARKED IN A RED ZONE.

20110112140335.000|20110112140336.000|CC1|TURN THE GUN ON THE TRAINING

20110112140346.000|20110112140348.000|CC1|HOSPITAL AND PRONOUNCED DEAD IN 
20110112140348.000|20110112140348.000|CC1|THE HOSPITAL.
